ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rogues and bards (was Why didn't I log out sooner?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, by True newbie I meant at levels 1-15 or so. About the point when you start getting enough loot between trips back to town (And you re far
ygData.messageBody:
>> From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
>> (stealing all their copper that, in not very many levels, they'll be
>> tossing in piles on the ground anyway??? And that if they are
>> true newbies worrying about that!)

>By "true newbie" I assume you mean non-twinks, since a non-twinked
>secondary character will need to count their coppers as much as a primary
>character at the lower levels.

Actually, by "True newbie" I meant at levels 1-15 or so. About the point
when you start getting enough loot between trips back to town (And you're
far enough away from town) That you destroy coppers to save the weight and
keep you light on your feet.

Twinked or not, ALL my characters save every copper they can get -- until
they run out of strength to carry it. And I haven't yet started throwing
silvers away. That still feels like a sacrilege.

>Twinks, as a general rule, only group with other twinks. I've gotten a few
>gifts (guard bracer, bracer of Erollisi, Dragoon Dirk, two earings of
>desease reflection & a carnelian wedding band to be exact), but still don't
>quite live up to the standards of twink groups.

As a twink, I group with whoever I can find to group with. I don't look
at equipment. Shoot, I don't know whether most of it is "good or bad"
even. What I look at is first, personality. SOmeone I can get along
with. and second, level range. Can I group with them. Occasionally,
we'll be specifically looking for a tank-type, or a healer-type. Or
a Snarer. But that's about it :)

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 28 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 8 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro, Phoenix /
